title: How to Not Write Bad: Common Writing Problems (2013)
description:
How to Not Write Bad: The Most Common Writing Problems and the Best Ways to Avoid Them



Ben Yagoda's How to Not Write Bad illustrates how we can all write better, more clearly, and for a wider readership.
 
He offers advice on what he calls "not-writing-badly," which consists of the ability, first, to craft sentences that are correct in terms of spelling, diction (word choice), punctuation, and grammar, and that also display clarity, precision, and grace.
